title: CoverLetter
description: A structured representation of a cover letter for a job application.

line1.description: A short introductory sentence summarizing your interest or qualification.

paragraph1.description: First main paragraph — usually introduces yourself and the purpose of your application.

paragraph2.description: Second main paragraph — highlights relevant experience, skills, and achievements.

paragraph3.description: Third main paragraph — connects your goals with the company's mission or closes the pitch.

examples.line1: As a Senior SEO Analyst passionate about structured data innovation, I'm excited to apply for this opportunity.
examples.paragraph1: Over the past several years, I’ve developed and implemented advanced SEO frameworks that blend data science, automation, and user intent modeling.
examples.paragraph2: At Wayfair, I led initiatives improving schema markup deployment through API-driven automation, resulting in measurable gains in rich result visibility and CTR.
examples.paragraph3: I’m particularly drawn to your team’s focus on technical excellence and innovation, and I believe my background aligns perfectly with your goals.
